generator.title: Generator
generator.description: Turn on and off the Generator
generator.tooltip: The Generator is the feature that generates faces. If you turn it off, you will not be able to generate faces.

content.off: Are you sure you want to turn off the Generator? You will not be able to generate faces.
content.on: Are you sure you want to turn on the Generator? You will be able to generate faces and use the Generator. If Stable Diffusion is on, it will be turned off.

stableDiffusion.title: Stable Diffusion
stableDiffusion.description: Turn on and off Stable Diffusion
stableDiffusion.tooltip: Stable Diffusion is a text-to-image model, it allows you to apply different modifications to the generated faces.

content.off: Are you sure you want to turn off Stable Diffusion?
content.on: Are you sure you want to turn on Stable Diffusion? If the Generator is on, it will be turned off.
